title: ‘It Doesn’t Look Good’: Vingegaard Crashes and Matteo Jorgenson Rides Back in Yellow Jersey
content:
Post-stage images captured Vingegaard grimacing in pain as he tried to remove his gloves. Visma fears the worst: 'It doesn’t look good. We have to go to the hospital.'

Read the full article at ‘It Doesn’t Look Good’: Vingegaard Crashes and Matteo Jorgenson Rides Back in Yellow Jersey on Velo.
author: ahood
